title: The Accidental Renovator : A Paris Story
description: The author takes the reader through her breakneck decisions and pace of life. Her ideal way of visiting a city is looking at real estate. She doesn't speak French, doesn't know anyone in Paris and has never thought of living there. But the autumn she's playing at buying an apartment, is just after a heatwave where 15,000 people died.
author: Barbara Biggs
